title: New: Childish Gambino – Centipede
content:
I’ve been on a bit of a Community trip recently, and I still find it hard to get my head around the fact that Troy is Childish Gambino.

Anyway, having taken a bit of time out, Donald Glover is all set to become one of the biggest rappers in the world, and this new cut is sure to propel him to such heights. Centipede is both soulful and aggressive at the same time, reminding me A LOT of College Dropout era Kanye. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
